original: Bergvall, Axel Ludvig, disponent, Norrköping, f. 15/2/86 i Norrköp. av rådm. o. fabr. Axel K. B. o. Ida Svensson. G. 13 m. Agda Anderson. Barn: Margit f. 14, Harriet 16. — Lärovistud. i Norrköp., in- o. uti. hand.-sk. Verkst. dir. i A-B Axel K. Bergvall & Söner fr. 17.
translated: Bergvall, Axel Ludvig, manager, Norrköping, born February 15, 1886 in Norrköping to councilman and manufacturer Axel K. B. and Ida Svensson. Married to Agda Anderson in 1913. Children: Margit born in 1914, Harriet born in 1916. Educated at a school in Norrköping for both elementary and high school, as well as a trade school. Managing director at A-B Axel K. Bergvall & Sons since 1917.
